meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vocal.
meanings.sent1: Her vocalnesses during the play impressed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The singer's vocalnesses were truly remarkable during the concert.
meanings.sent3: His vocalnesses in the karaoke contest made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The vocalnesses of the birds in the morning filled the air with music.
meanings.sent5: The vocalnesses of the choir resonated beautifully in the church.

meanings.definition: The act of speaking or singing with one's voice.
meanings.sent1: The vocalnesses of the actor captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her vocalnesses every day to improve her singing.
meanings.sent3: The cat's vocalnesses when asking for food were adorable.
meanings.sent4: His vocalnesses echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The vocalnesses of the baby filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The ability to express oneself verbally.
meanings.sent1: Her vocalnesses in the debate competition were impressive.
meanings.sent2: He used his vocalnesses to share his thoughts with the world.
meanings.sent3: The robot's vocalnesses in the movie were unexpectedly funny.
meanings.sent4: The politician's vocalnesses resonated with the voters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's vocalnesses inspired her students to speak up.
